data.body: This is fake news i can inject anytthing her
Refused bail in Melbourne Magistrates' Court.

quote.text: "There's really not enough there for me to justify releasing you on bail"

data.body: Arrives at Dame Phyllis Frost Centre and seen by medical staff, given medication.
Buzzes intercom four times to report feeling unwell and vomits three times.
Nelson vomits, uses buzzes for help five times. Is told:

quote.text: "They won't be able to do nothing"

data.body: Asks for socks as feet are cramping. Soon after, staff hand socks through cell hatch as Nelson appears unsteady.
Buzzes for help six times, reports cramping and needing a drink. She is moved cells but vomits again.
Again asks for a drink, and five times to see doctor. She's told intercom is for emergencies only.
Given medicine through the cell hatch and again asks to see doctor. Medical staff attend before she's moved to another cell and vomits again.
Doctor and nurse return, Nelson's examined and given electrolytes. She vomits two more times over next hour.
Formal reception assessment completed after earlier deemed too unwell to complete. It's noted there are no illnesses or conditions that would affect prison placement.
Transferred from medical ward to the general population Yarra Unit.

Buzzes and asks for blankets twice due to cramping. Three prison officers then seen approaching, feeding blanket through cell hatch. Another inmate says Nelson continues to scream for help repeatedly.
Buzzes for help. As does another inmate to alert staff.
Nurse and prison officers attend cell. Give paracetamol and maxolon through cell flap. Nurse pries open Nelson's fingers to place pills in her hand, ''because they were cramped into a claw''.
Buzzes officer's post 11 times. She's told:

quote.text: "I don't have keys'', ''the nurse isn't going to come down'', ''stop … you're keeping other prisoners awake"

data.body: Buzzes for help. As does another inmate to alert staff.
Second last call.
Last communication with Nelson.
Nelson doesn’t respond to morning prisoner count. Her body is found on floor of cell 40.
